data.eml:eml: New South American genus and species of Pteroplatini (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Cerambycinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Napp, Dilma Solange, Martins, Ubirajara R. (2006): New South American genus and species of Pteroplatini (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Cerambycinae). Zootaxa 1173: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.2645774
